## AbstractPostEffect.requireDepthAttachment() method

Checks whether this post effect requires the scene depth buffer

**Signature:**

```typescript
abstract requireDepthAttachment(): boolean;
```
**Returns:**

boolean

true if the scene depth buffer is required.
